content: I've been trying to write jokes every day, even if it's just for 10-15 minutes, to keep my creative juices flowing. I've been using a joke-writing app that prompts me with topics and I've been coming up with some really funny stuff. I'm thinking of starting a comedy blog to share my writing and connect with other comedians online. Do you have any tips on how to structure a comedy blog and what kind of content I should post?
